articles.author: Ryan Dinsdale
articles.title: Until Dawn PS5 and PC Remake Suffers a Rough Launch - IGN
articles.description: Sony's Until Dawn remake for PlayStation 5 and PC is having a rough launch, with not just technical issues but low player numbers.
articles.content:
Sony's Until Dawn remake for PlayStation 5 and PC is having a rough launch, with not just technical issues but low player numbers too.
The remake of the 2015 horror game which comes with updated gra… [+2793 chars]
